onyomiExamples.meaning: direction, way, side, area (in a particular direction), side (of an argument, etc.), one's part, type, category, field (of study, etc.), indicates one side of a comparison, way, method, manner, means, length (of each side of a square)
right side, style of Japanese court music

kunyomiExamples.meaning: direction, way, person, lady, gentleman, method of, manner of, way of, care of ..., person in charge of ..., side (e.g. "on my mother's side")
people, (all) persons, everyone, ladies and gentlemen, you (usu. plural), various
master, boss, chief, foreman, supervisor, stable master, craftsman, artisan, foster parent
attitude, approach, move, theater usher, theatre usher
